title: What functions does my TalkBand B2 support?
answer:
The TalkBand B2 supports the following functions:

  • Bluetooth calling
  • Activity detection & monitoring (walking, running, etc.)
  • Calorie calculation
  • Activity reminders
  • Smart alarms
  • Remote control for smart phone camera (EMUI 2.3 or later, Huawei phones only)
  • Displays time, date and day
  • Find my phone
